results.title: Efficacy and Safety of Bacillus coagulans LBSC in Drug Induced Constipation Associated With Functional Gastrointestinal Disorder: A Double-Blind, Randomized, Interventional, Parallel, Controlled Trial a Clinical Study on Bacillus coagulans LBSC for Drug Induced Constipation Associated With FGIDs.
results.text_hl: Methods: A prospective, interventional, randomized, double-blind, parallel, multi-arm, controlled trial with 168 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ experiencing drug induced @DISEASE_Constipation @DISEASE_MESH:D003248 @@@constipation@@@ associated with @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@FGID symptoms@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Abnormalities_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000014 @@@DICAWFGID@@@) screened through Rome IV criteria were randomized into 2 arms, i.e. placebo arm (n = 28) and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amitriptyline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000639 @@@amitriptyline@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ in test arm (n = 28/arm).

citations.NLM: Rathi A, Pagare R. Efficacy and Safety of Bacillus coagulans LBSC in Drug Induced Constipation Associated With Functional Gastrointestinal Disorder: A Double-Blind, Randomized, Interventional, Parallel, Controlled Trial a Clinical Study on Bacillus coagulans LBSC for Drug Induced Constipation Associated With FGIDs. Glob Adv Integr Med Health. 2024 Jan-Dec;13():27536130241286511. PMID: 39295947
citations.BibTeX: @article{39295947, title={Efficacy and Safety of Bacillus coagulans LBSC in Drug Induced Constipation Associated With Functional Gastrointestinal Disorder: A Double-Blind, Randomized, Interventional, Parallel, Controlled Trial a Clinical Study on Bacillus coagulans LBSC for Drug Induced Constipation Associated With FGIDs.}, author={Rathi A and Pagare R}, journal={Glob Adv Integr Med Health}, volume={13}, pages={27536130241286511}}

results.title: Effect of treatment with chlorthalidone and atenolol on response to dilator agents in the forearm resistance vessels of men with primary hypertension.
results.text_hl: We have examined the effect on this @<m>DISEASE_Abnormalities_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000014 @@@functional abnormality@@@ of treatment with @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@ (50 mg daily in 16 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (100 mg daily in eight @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ and 200 mg daily in two).

citations.NLM: Robinson BF, Dobbs RJ, Phillips RJ. Effect of treatment with chlorthalidone and atenolol on response to dilator agents in the forearm resistance vessels of men with primary hypertension. Br J Clin Pharmacol. 1983 Sep;16(3):327-32. PMID: 6626425
citations.BibTeX: @article{6626425, title={Effect of treatment with chlorthalidone and atenolol on response to dilator agents in the forearm resistance vessels of men with primary hypertension.}, author={Robinson BF and Dobbs RJ and Phillips RJ}, journal={Br J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={16}, number={3}, pages={327-32}}
